ComicInfo.Title: The Cure For You Part III; What If?
ComicInfo.Summary:
Jennika's collision with her past reaches its climax as old enemies return! Alone and seemingly outmatched, Jennika must search inside herself and ask if the cure for mutation is worth the price...
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- Reg | Regular Cover | Brahm Revel | 1 | RI | 1:10 Retailer Incentive Variant Cover | Peach Momoko | 2 | RE | IDW Convention Exclusive Variant Cover | Jodi Nishijima | 3 | RE | Frankie's Comics Exclusive Variant Cover (Homage) | Alan Quah | 4 | RE | Sanctum Sanctorum Comics Exclusive Variant Cover | Rian Gonzales | 5 | RE | Sanctum Sanctorum Comics & Slab City Comics Exclusive Variant Cover (Virgin) | Peach Momoko | 6 | *Notes:* The Frankie's Comics Exclusive Variant Cover is a homage of the cover of Thor #337.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-05-24 03:35:25. [CVDB770164]
ComicInfo.CoverArtist: Alan Quah, Brahm Revel, Jodi Nishijima, Peach MoMoKo, Rian Gonzales
ComicInfo.Characters: Bebop, Donatello, Jennika, Leonardo, Master Splinter, Michelangelo, Raphael, Rocksteady, Shredder
